text: (nabiye!) “ohu allah kerehi boruva manakkalpita kara pavasanneya” yayi ovun (oba gæna) pavasannehuda? (ese nam apage mema dharmaya ovunta oba kiyava penvimata nohæki andamata) allah adahas kale nam, obage hrdaya mata mudra tabannata ida tibuni. (ebævin ovunge mema kiyamana sampurnayenma væradi ekak vanneya). allah nam, boruva vinasa kara, tamange vadana maginma satyaya sthira karanneku vasayen sitinneya. niyata vasayenma ohu hrdayanhi (rahasin tabagena) æti dæyada hondin danneku vasayen sitinneya
